column4: Hello All...   Is there any way to get ahold of the 'snd-rtctimer' kernel module (for use with Rosegarden (under Ubu 10.04 LTS), short of recompiling the whole kernel ?
technically, that question can be asked here, but better as in #ubuntustudio, as it is more music oriented
Thanks..  I'll go there...  They can probably answer a few of my other audio related ?'s..  ttfn
